title: A replie vnto M. Hardinges ansvveare by perusinge whereof the discrete, and diligent reader may easily see, the weake, and vnstable groundes of the Romaine religion, whiche of late hath beene accompted Catholique. By Iohn Iewel Bishoppe of Sarisburie.
author: Jewel, John, 1522-1571.
publicationStmtPublisher: In Fleetestreate, at the signe of the Blacke Oliphante, by Henry VVykes,
